players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I am the detective and I found Bob is the mafioso"
You: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game."
Diana: "I am the detective and I have evidence that Bob is the mafioso. Let's work together to find out what happened to Alice."
Charlie: "Let's verify Diana's claim. I will question Bob to see if he has any alibis for the night Alice was found dead."
You: "I have nothing to hide and I did not kill Alice. I was at my hideout during the night, as is my usual routine."
